subject: Analyze figures from records such as sales forecasts, orders, and production records, to obtain accurate inventory.
body:
The cream of the crop for 2007 - GET IN EARLY! DSDI IS SET TO ROCK YOUR
PORTFOLIO!

DSI Direct Sales, Inc.
Symbol: DSDI
Price: $0.05

There is a MASSIVE PROMOTION underway this weekend! This is hot, read
the news and get on DSDI first thing Monday!

Excellent benefits are offered. In your past positions, define your
percentage of time spent in the home office and in the field.
NCEES record preferred.
Also, perform designs for hot-rolled and built-up steel components in
cold-formed specialty buildings. A large EPC firm is seeking a very
senior Instrumentation and Controls Engineer to lead its IandC staff in
Houston.
Why would you consider this area? Experience in refineries, chemicals,
or power industry is a must, working in field construction or
maintenance office environment.
The ability to lead and train others is a must. Candidate will direct
the condition based maintenance program to optimize the utilization of
maintenance resources utilizing appropriate technologies to assess
equipment conditions (i.
